text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
The day following my impactful first<n>encounter with Air
Groove, I overhear<n>a frantic voice in the hallway.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove's Trainer
text_block_list.text:
Wh-why won't you listen to me? I'm<n>Air Groove's trainer,
am I not?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Tracen Academy respects its<n>students' autonomy above all
else.<n>That is why the student council<n>system exists to
begin with.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove's Trainer
text_block_list.text:
But if she attempts to keep up with<n>student council activities
and tutoring,<n>it will hinder her own growth. So<n>please!

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Air Groove has joined the student<n>council with clear
intention and<n>purpose. No one can have her<n>abdicate the
role but herself.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Have you consulted with her on the<n>matter of quitting the
student council?

text_block_list.name: Air Groove's Trainer
text_block_list.text: W-well...

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: No, I can't recall her ever doing so.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove's Trainer
text_block_list.text: Air Groove? But why are you here<n>right now?

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
I'm sorry to have let this disturb you,<n>Miss President. I'll
talk to her alone<n>from here.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Is that so? I'll be on my way then.<n>Just... don't be too hard
on her, okay?

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: ...I'll try.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: Now then... I think you've<n>overstepped the line.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove's Trainer
text_block_list.text:
Wait—please listen to what I have to<n>say! I'm just worried
that you might<n>be spending your precious time on<n>things
that don't matter!

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
Things that "don't matter"? If that's<n>how you see it, then I
see no further<n>point trying to reason with you.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove's Trainer
text_block_list.text:
No... Why? Don't you want to be<n>winning races? You need
to consider<n>how you manage the time you spend!

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
Winning races, you say... If that's<n>your sole concern, then
I'm afraid we<n>were never going to see eye-to-eye.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
This conversation is finished.<n>Consider our contract void as
of this<n>very moment. Now, if you'll excuse<n>me.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Oh brother, there she goes doin' it<n>again.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Yep. Honestly, I'm not sure if she'll<n>ever find a trainer who
lives up to her<n>crazy standards...

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Wait, you've been starin' at Air<n>Groove all slack-jawed
again?! You<n>don't learn either, do you?

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Oh, but wait. I guess this would be<n>something of a chance
for you then,<n>huh?

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Look at that! You could go over and<n>try to scout her right
now!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Course, as you saw just now, the<n>Empress isn't exactly
easy to win<n>over. If I were you, I'd take my time<n>and—oh.
Welp, so much for waiting.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Determined not to miss this<n>opportunity, I quickly chase
after Air<n>Groove. Upon reaching the boulevard<n>outside the
school building, she stops<n>and gives a sigh of frustration.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
Good heavens... For a school as<n>prestigious as Tracen, it
sure does<n>seem to be lacking in quality trainers<n>as of late.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: If only there were someone I could<n>fully place my trust in...
choice_data_list: Air Groove, I've come to scout you!
Air Groove, I've come to scout you!

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: Huh? And just who on earth areyou? Bold of you to make such awild statement out of nowhere!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I can understand why she's<n>frustrated at the moment, so I
remain<n>strong and politely state my<n>intentions.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
Hmph. You're persistent, I'll give you<n>that. But I'm
sorry—I've had enough<n>with trainers at the moment.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
And I'm certainly not about to sign up<n>with a greenhorn
trainer like—

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: Actually, wait.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
I plan to do some strength training<n>tomorrow at the campus
gym. Bring<n>me your proposed strength-training<n>regimen.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
If you can prove some basic<n>competence as a trainer, then
maybe<n>we'll talk.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I spend the entire night frantically<n>constructing a prospective
training<n>course.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: The next day...

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
Hmm, I'll give you a pass. It looks<n>like you have what it
takes to manage<n>a regimen at least.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: Here are the terms of our contract:you shall guide me in training, andconcern yourself only with mytraining.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
Everything else will be left up to me.<n>That includes my
involvement in the<n>student council and the management<n>of
my own free time.
choice_data_list:
So does this mean you're accepting my scouting
offer?

So does this mean you're accepting my scouting
offer?

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
Yes, as long as you stick to the terms.<n>So let's make this
formal.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
I am the Empress, Air Groove. I aim<n>to embody the ideals of
all<n>Umamusume and serve as a guiding<n>beacon for all.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
While results on the track are of<n>course essential, they're
far from all I<n>seek. If I can't garner the admiration<n>befitting
an empress, they mean<n>nothing.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
You'll have a very specific role to<n>play amidst these
aspirations. I trust<n>you understand that?

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: I sense a bit of hesitancy. I'll<n>overlook it for now.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: Not like I plan to actually rely onyou...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Thus begin my days of supporting Air<n>Groove as she runs a
noble path.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: Is that all for today? I'll be taking my<n>leave, then.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
I'm hardly compelled to tell you... but<n>no matter. I spend time
guiding some<n>of the more junior students.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
The academy offers instruction for<n>runners who haven't
signed up with a<n>trainer, but it's a uniform curriculum<n>that
can't account for every student's<n>needs.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
Some students find themselves<n>struggling with the lack of<n>
personalized guidance. I aim to simply<n>keep them on track
until they find a<n>trainer.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: Now, if you'll excuse me.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: What? A meeting? Now?

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
No can do—I'm on my way to attend a<n>student council
cleanup event.<n>Besides, I've told you to give at least<n>one
day's notice when making<n>schedule changes.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
Compile all your points in a document<n>and send it to me
later. I'll take a look<n>at least.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Our contract has only just begun, but<n>I've quickly come to
appreciate the<n>concerns her previous trainers have<n>
shown...
